Package index

All functions

bcbio_nfcore_check()
Function to check samplesheet for nf-core
bcbio_templates()
Function to help deploy analysis folder inside a project folder
bcbio_vsd_data
varianceStabilizingTransformation Object from Test Data
cb_friendly_colors
list of colorblind-friendly colors, developed by James and client
cb_friendly_cols()
fetch color from list by name
cb_friendly_pal()
access cb friendly palette by name, reversing if necessary
cb_friendly_palettes
define main colorblind-friendly palette as well as sub-palettes
list_cb_friendly_cols()
list cb friendly colors
scale_color_cb_friendly()
use cb friendly colors as color aesthetic with ggplot
scale_fill_cb_friendly()
use cb friendly colors as fill aesthetic with ggplot
use_library()
Set custom library to your project

Developed by Pantano Lorena.
